A blood bank is a place where blood is collected and stored before it is used for transfusions. Blood banking takes place in the lab. This is to make sure that donated blood and blood products are safe before they are used. Blood banking also determines the blood type. You can ask for any type of blood you need and also you can easily see who n]is needed of blood in realtime BloodBank.Live respects the privacy of its users and has developed this Privacy Policy to demonstrate its commitment to protecting your privacy. These privacy policies (the "Privacy Policy") are intended to describe for you, as an individual who is a user of mobile app and services offered by BloodBank.Live, the information we collect, how that information may be used, with whom it may be shared, and your choices about such uses and disclosures.
We encourage you to read this Privacy Policy carefully when using this app. By using this app, you are accepting the practices described in this Privacy Policy.
If you have any questions about our privacy practices, please refer to the end of this Privacy Policy for information on How to Contact Us. Contact dev.lincoln47@gmail.com Privacy and Policy Privacy Policy Doner Registration By sign in through our app you will be registered as blood donor, however you will get blood request only if our search criteria matches your blood group, location and donation history. Information Collection We may use information that we collect about you to deliver the information to show in the app, perform research and analysis about blood donors, requesters, blood donations etc, communicate with you by e-mail, mobile devices, to facilitate your contact details to blood requester for sending message or calling you directly, enforce our terms and conditions. We may collect personal information that can identify you, such as your name, email address, contact details, location and other information also that does identify you but required for the app like your blood group. When you provide personal information through our app, the information may be sent to our servers. Information Uses Protection Of Personal Information We take care of the personal information of user with the maximum security. We never use or share any kind of information in any other service or we never share this with other. The information isonly available to the users of this application.
